recipe.title: Loaded Potato Chip Dip Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 cup ; shredded cheddar cheese, plus extra for topping ; (100 g)
½ cup ; bacon, crumbled, plus extra for topping ; (115 g)
¼ cup ; green onion, chopped, plus extra for topping ; (25 g)

steps.step: Combine the sour cream, cream cheese, and ranch seasoning in a large bowl and stir until smooth.
Add in the cheddar cheese and stir until well-blended.
Lastly, add in the crumbled bacon and the green onions and stir.
Top off with extra green onions, bacon, and cheese and serve with potato chips, potato wedges, or fries!

steps_updated.steps_updated: Combine the sour cream, cream cheese, and ranch seasoning in a large bowl and stir until smooth.
Add in the cheddar cheese and stir until well-blended.
Lastly, add in the crumbled bacon and the green onions and stir.
Top off with extra green onions, bacon, and cheese and serve with potato chips, potato wedges, or fries!
